User Colors Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»Options, select Environment from the Category list, and click the Custom Colors button in the Colors section to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to modify user-defined colors or define new colors to display in the color picker.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • User Color Name—Displays the name of the user-defined color that appears in the color picker. Delete a color name to remove the user-defined color from the color picker.
  • User Color Picker—Displays a color picker so you can select a color to associate with the corresponding name.
